alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Morgan; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 1:24AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, Butts, Jasper and southeastern Newton Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 123 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Starrsville to McKibben, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Madison, Monticello, Newborn, Flovilla, Mansfield, Jenkinsburg, Shady Dale, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Worthville, McKibben, Starrsville, Calvin, Farrar, Eudora, North Alcovy, McElheneys Crossroads, Indian Springs State Park and Fincherville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
